WorkItem.ClosedComment: Upgraded tcPDF to version 5.9.009 (2010-10-21) fixes the initial issues with borders, although there are still problems with borders in merged cells. It is also a big performance overhead: tcPDF is already horrendously slow and bloated, and performance has degraded still further with this upgrade.
WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel_Writer_PDF does not handle cell borders correctly

Comments.Message:
It seems latest version of tcpdf works with latest version of PHPExcel and corrects alot of bugs...

I got this from one of my colleague who updated manually tcPDF in release 1.7.3c.
@Laukoko - Thanks for feeding that back. I'll take a look at the latest version of tcpdf

Using the latest tcPDF with my formatted test sheet gave extra-thick cell borders for all cells with no borders defined, and wasn't good for borders on merged cells, so this needs further investigation
